amendment.description: Amendment establishes a national standard for hiring motor carriers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 114 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to establish a national standard for hiring motor carriers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan (TN) amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 191 (Roll no. 163).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Duncan (TN).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duncan (TN) amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 191 (Roll no. 163).
